name: Night Trap - 25th Anniversary Edition
description: Night Trap tells the story of five teenage girls spending the weekend at the Martin home. As a member of the Special Control Attack Team, your job is to monitor the home and protect the girls using an intricate system of cameras and traps as it is being invaded by vampires.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti Storage: 3 GB available space
